name: Child Development Center
description: The Family School Child Development Center is a community-based program, which provides infant, toddler and preschool care to children from four months through five years of age. Infant care to the children 4 months - 3 years. The nursery staff consists of an Infant/Toddler Lead Teacher, Teachers and Assistants.
fullDescription: The Family School Child Development Center is a community-based program, which provides infant, toddler and preschool care to children from four months through five years of age. Infant care to the children 4 months - 3 years. The nursery staff consists of an Infant/Toddler Lead Teacher, Teachers and Assistants.
whatTheyOffer: The Family School Child Development Center is a community-based program, which provides infant, toddler and preschool care to children from four months through five years of age. Infant care to the children 4 months - 3 years. The nursery staff consists of an Infant/Toddler Lead Teacher, Teachers and Assistants.
howToGetIt: One or more personal interviews with the parent and child is conducted and an application packet is completed.
cost: This is a fee based service
